code.html:
{heading}

{subheading}

{#each tiers as tier}

{tier.title}

{tier.price.numerator} {tier.price.denominator}
{@html tier.description}
    {#each tier.features as { item, icon }}
  • {item}
    • {/each}
{#if tier.link.label} {tier.link.label} {/if}
{/each}

{heading}

    {#each cards as card}

  • {card.title}

    {@html card.description}
    • {/each}

{#each teasers as teaser}

{teaser.title}

{@html teaser.body}
{#if teaser.link.url} {teaser.link.label} {/if}
{#if teaser.image.url} {/if}
{/each}

{heading}

{subheading} {#if buttons.length > 0}
{#each buttons as button, i} {button.link.label} {/each}
{/if}

{heading}

    {#each cards as card, i}
  1. {i+1}.
    {card.title} {@html card.subtitle}
    2. {/each}
{#if button.link.label} {button.link.label} {/if}

{#each nav as { link }} {link.label} {/each}
Primo Powered
{#each social as { link, icon }} {/each}

{heading}

{#each items as item, i (i)}
{#if activeItem === i}
{@html item.description}
{/if}
{/each}

{#if logo.title} {logo.title} {:else if logo.image.url} {/if}
{#each site_nav as { link }} {link.label} {/each}

{/if}

teasers.title: This is a component
teasers.body: To edit its content all you have to do is hover over the component and click the "edit content" button. To edit the code switch the green toggle at the top, hover over this component, and click "edit code" button.
